title: Shen Or Camille?
body:
That Shen skin, I WANT IT. I have liked Shen but I feel like he’s in a way too boring. E, AA, Q, W,  AA, AA, AA. Just the cooldowns. I love his ult and E tho. He’s a tank and everyone wants tanks, his R can save people and give you a free kill.

Camille on the other hand, so much more fast paced. The abilities are on small cooldowns and just occupying with the keyboard. She’s meta but gets banned a lot too. 

I’m not the best with AA resets or animation cancelling so I’m thinking Shen but Camille though. Shen winrates have been terrible but for Camille they’re great with a high play rate.

Thoughts?

replies.body:
it took me over 80 games to finally learn every combo camille has up to the flash animation canceling second proc of the Q. 

camille is more reward-able to learn than shen because she even counters shen.

she deals true damage every 2-3 seconds and if shen ults to save someone she takes towers as fast as yorik
